column4: i'm a student so I have tohave a working word processer and abi-word seems to be the best in linux but it still dont work as good as word 2003, so i'll probably have to run vista in a separate system.
runing word 2003 in wine is messy
with vista, you'll end up getting much more than you'd bargained for ;)
I wouldn;t pay for it anyways, so its no big deal.
